author: dna webdesk
title: dna Must Read for evening: 2 Indians detained in Saudi for terror links, Pune man beheads wife and more
text:
Here are the top stories on dna:
1) Two Indians with links to LeT, Indian Mujahideen detained in Saudi Arabia: Terrorists have links with the Lashkar-e-Taiba. read full story here
2) Delhi CM Arvind Kejriwal sacks minister Asim Ahmed; challenges BJP to remove Shivraj Chouhan, Raje: Serious complaint of corruption against our Cabinet Minister Asim Ahmed has been filed. Full report here
3) Man walks holding severed head of his wife on road in Pune: Watch the video report here
4) Future Group partners Ramdev's Patanjali Ayurved to sell FMCG products: The companies are also considering to have production partnership and jointly develop brands in the long-term. Read more .
5) Veteran music director Ravindra Jain passes away: Jain was reportedly suffering from urinary infection causing a problem in his kidney. Full report here .
